name: Amoxicillin 500 MG
Uses: Amoxicillin treats only bacterial infections. It will not work for viral infections.

name: apixaban 2.5 MG
Uses: Apixaban is an anticoagulant (blood thinner) that reduces blood clotting and reduces the risk of stroke

name: aprepitant 80 MG
Uses: Aprepitant is used with other medications to help prevent nausea and vomiting caused by cancer drug

name: Atomoxetine 25 MG
Uses: Atomoxetine is used to treat attention-deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) as part of a total treatment plan, including psychological, social, and other treatments. It may help to increase the ability to pay attention, concentrate, stay focused, and stop fidgeting. It is thought to work by restoring the balance of certain natural substances (neurotransmitters) in the brain

name: benzonatate 100 MG
Uses: This medication is used to treat coughs caused by the common cold and other breathing problems

name: Calcitriol 0.00025 MG
Uses: Calcitriol is a man-made active form of vitamin D. Most people get enough vitamin D

name: carvedilol 3.125 MG
Uses: Carvedilol is used to treat high blood pressure and heart failure.

name: celecoxib 200 MG
Uses: This medication is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) and It is used to treat arthritis, acute pain and menstrual pain

name: duloxetine 30 MG
Drug Class: Selective serotonin and norepinephrine reuptake inhibitors (SNRIs)
Uses: Duloxetine may improve your mood, sleep, appetite, and energy level, and decrease nervousness. It can also decrease pain due to certain medical conditions

name: eltrombopag 25 MG
Uses: This medication is used to treat low platelet levels in people who have a certain blood disorder

name: montelukast 10 MG
Uses: Montelukast is used to control and prevent symptoms caused by asthma

name: mycophenolate mofetil 250 MG
Uses: Mycophenolate is used in combination with other medications to keep your body from attacking and rejecting your transplanted organ (such as kidney, liver, heart)

name: Oseltamivir 45 MG
Uses: Oseltamivir is used to treat symptoms caused by the flu virus (influenza)

name: pantoprazole 40 MG
Uses: Pantoprazole is used to treat certain stomach and esophagus problems

name: Pitavastatin 1 MG
Uses: Pitavastatin is used along with a proper diet to help lower "bad" cholesterol and fats (such as LDL, triglycerides) and raise "good" cholesterol (HDL) in the blood

name: prasugrel 10 MG
Uses: Prasugrel is used with aspirin by patients with heart disease. This medication helps to prevent other serious heart/blood vessel problems.

name: Ramipril 5 MG
Uses: Ramipril is used to treat high blood pressure

name: saxagliptin 5 MG
Uses: Saxagliptin is used with a proper diet and exercise program to control high blood sugar in people with type 2 diabetes

name: sitagliptin 50 MG
Uses: Sitagliptin is used with a proper diet and exercise program and possibly with other medications to control high blood sugar

name: tadalafil 5 MG
Uses: Tadalafil is used to treat male sexual function problems
